title: Best of the Program | Guest: Steven Crowder | 11/25/19
description:
Billionaire Michael Bloomberg has FINALLY joined the 2020 Democratic race. But will his immense wealth and ad strategy overcome his faults? For starters, he put bans on salt and soda and had quite a few #MeToo issues. And the Yale v. Harvard football game was invaded by climate change protesters. BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder joins with a preview of tonight’s “Epstein Didn’t Kill Himself” special, where he’ll attempt to recreate Epstein’s “suicide” … for science. Also, Rick Perry now thinks Trump's the chosen one, and Rev. Franklin Graham praises Trump’s economy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
